Class SqlFromTableReferenceJoinedTableCondition

java.lang.Object
  analyzer.SqlFromTableReferenceJoinedTableCondition
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SqlFromTableReferenceJoinedTableCondition
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Copyright (c) 2009-2011 e-Amrita - Giampietro Zedda Turin (ITALY)

SqlFromTableReferenceFullJoinExpression

Descrive la condizione di un join usato in una join-condition di una clausola FROM

Since:
16/lug/2011
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Giampietro Zedda
See Also:
SqlFromTableReference, SqlSelectStatement, SqlFullSelect, Serialized Form

public SqlSearchConditions getSearchCondition()
Restituisce le condizione di search se il tipo di join è:

  • INNER
  • LEFT OUTER
  • RIGHT OUTER
